headline: Hanover Insurance Eyes Specialty Growth Amid Catastrophe Risks
summary: Hanover Insurance targets Specialty growth with technology upgrades and disciplined underwriting, while catastrophe risks test its profitability.

headline: Why Progressive (PGR) is a Top Momentum Stock for the Long-Term
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

headline: Carriers Build Policyholder Trust with Security Elements and Expand Market with Spanish-Language Services and Coverage Assessment Tools
summary: Keynova Group, the principal competitive intelligence source for digital financial services firms, today announced the results of the Q3 2025 edition of its semi-annual Mobile Insurance Scorecard. The competitive report benchmarks the mobile apps and mobile websites of the 12 largest U.S. auto and property insurance carriers, naming Progressive and GEICO as co-leaders in Overall Score for the mobile user experience.
